content: In a Questionnaire, it's possible to define a question with the "reference" type. Any type of reference is seemingly allowed. Is there a way to define the expected reference type/s in a Questionnaire question?

Yes. See these extensions: http://build.fhir.org/extension-questionnaire-allowedresource.html, http://build.fhir.org/extension-questionnaire-allowedprofile.html, http://build.fhir.org/extension-questionnaire-referencefilter.html
